radiographic_examinations.findings: Extensive imaging, including octreotide scanning, has been unrevealing in locating the causative tumor.
Whole-body magnetic resonance imaging has been unsuccessful in locating a tumor.
Computed tomography has been unsuccessful in locating a tumor.
Technecium Tc 99 bone scintigraphy demonstrates diffuse skeletal uptake, referred to as a 'superscan', and focal uptake at sites of fractures.
